remarks: Membership of a vector in a ball.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvelbl.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvelbl.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvelbl.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nvelbl.8 $e |- D = ( IndMet ` U ) $.
nvelbl $p |- ( ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ R e. RR+ ) /\ ( P e. X /\ A e. X ) ) -> ( A e. ( P ( ball ` D ) R ) <-> ( N ` ( A M P ) ) < R ) ) $.
